name: Death Coming
description: 'Death Coming' is a non-linear puzzle game where you must harvest human souls ‘Final Destination’ style. However, pesky mortals are not your only problem, as the Agents of Light will do everything they can to stop you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista,Windows 7,Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista,Windows 7,Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
